issue.title: [Python] Allow type inference for struct arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2074](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2074). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support inferring a struct type in a `pa.array` call, if a sequence of dicts (or dict of sequences?= is given. Of course, this could mean that the wrong field order may be inferred, though on Python 3.6+ dicts retain ordering until the first deletion.
